text: Tumi ki taderake dekhani, yara mrtyura bhaye nijedera ghara chere beriye giyechilena? Athaca tara chila hajara hajara. Tarapara allaha taderake balalena mare ya'o. Tarapara taderake jibita kare dilena. Niscaya'i allaha manusera upara anugrahakari. Kintu adhikansa loka sukariya prakasa kare na.
